name: Samson
description: Strongest man who ever lived. Long hair held his Nazarite power. Killed a lion, slew thousands, pulled down a temple. Tragic hero.

pushing-pillars.name: Bringing Down the Temple
pushing-pillars.description: Pushing apart the pillars, bringing down Dagon's temple
pushing-pillars.prompt: standing between two massive pillars pushing them apart - muscles straining, blind eyes, chains broken, temple beginning to collapse, 'let me die with the Philistines'

killing-lion.name: Killing the Lion
killing-lion.description: Tearing apart a lion with bare hands
killing-lion.prompt: tearing apart lion with bare hands - powerful grip on jaw and head, treating deadly beast like it was nothing, the strength of God flowing through him

jawbone-warrior.name: With the Jawbone
jawbone-warrior.description: Standing among defeated enemies, jawbone raised
jawbone-warrior.prompt: standing with donkey jawbone raised - bodies of enemies around him, wild long hair, having just slain a thousand men with improvised weapon

carrying-gates.name: Carrying Gaza's Gates
carrying-gates.description: Walking away with city gates on shoulders
carrying-gates.prompt: walking up hill carrying massive city gates on shoulders - posts, doors, and bar, laughing at enemies' attempt to trap him, strength that mocks fortifications

blind-in-chains.name: Blind and Bound
blind-in-chains.description: Grinding grain, humiliated but hair regrowing
blind-in-chains.prompt: blind, chained, grinding grain in prison - humiliated hero, but hair beginning to grow back, the comeback being prepared in the darkness

long-hair-glory.name: In His Strength
long-hair-glory.description: Samson at full power, hair flowing
long-hair-glory.prompt: standing in full strength with long hair flowing - muscles defined, Nazarite in his glory, the strongest man alive, unstoppable force
